### Logging

## Shortcuts
The following shortcuts are available:

| Shortcut   |                  |
|------------|------------------|
| `Ctrl`+`Q` | Exit as failure  |
| `Ctrl`+`P` | Exit as pass     |
| `+`        | Increase timeout |

!!! Note

    The `Esc` key is disabled in order to prevent accidentally dismissing the dialog.
